Summary: Noticed a bright light from living room window, went to check it out.
divs: sighting detailswe noticed a bright light hanging in the sky for a couple of minutes before investigating. first we used a pair of binoculars and a cellphone to capture far away pictures and video. after some time, we brought out a celestron telescope and focused in on the light. i decided to put my camera lens from my cell phone up to the eyepiece of the telescope and captured some video and a couple of pictures. the attachments are the two best pictures i that i captured. also the ufo appeared to change colors between red, yellow, blue,green and white. any info you have regarding this experience would be appreciated. {pid} {cms\jat\pid} text moved to narrative
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Greenfield
